title: Even the Devil Went to Church
description: In the small town of Morris, Alabama, faith is a way of life. But when resident Michael Reese is murdered in his home, rumors involving a local pastor begin to swirl as the truth ends up turning the community upside down. Andrea Canning has chosen this episode as one of her most memorable episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
